ps1.3:1.1: Solasavatthukam anapanassatisamadhim bhavayato samadhikani dve nanasatani uppajjanti—
ps1.3:1.2: attha paripanthe nanani, attha ca upakare nanani, attharasa upakkilese nanani, terasa vodane nanani, battimsa satokarissa nanani, catuvisati samadhivasena nanani, dvesattati vipassanavasena nanani, attha nibbidananani, attha nibbidanulomananani, attha nibbidapatippassaddhinanani, ekavisati vimuttisukhe nanani.
ps1.3:2.1: Katamani attha paripanthe nanani, attha ca upakare nanani?
ps1.3:2.2: Kamacchando samadhissa paripantho, nekkhammam samadhissa upakaram.
ps1.3:2.3: Byapado samadhissa paripantho, abyapado samadhissa upakaram.
ps1.3:2.4: Thinamiddham samadhissa paripantho, alokasanna samadhissa upakaram.
ps1.3:2.5: Uddhaccam samadhissa paripantho, avikkhepo samadhissa upakaram.
ps1.3:2.6: Vicikiccha samadhissa paripantho, dhammavavatthanam samadhissa upakaram.
ps1.3:2.7: Avijja samadhissa paripantho, nanam samadhissa upakaram.
ps1.3:2.8: Arati samadhissa paripantho, pamojjam samadhissa upakaram.
ps1.3:2.9: Sabbepi akusala dhamma samadhissa paripantha, sabbepi kusala dhamma samadhissa upakara.
ps1.3:2.10: Imani attha paripanthe nanani, attha ca upakare nanani.
ps1.3:3.1: Imehi solasahi akarehi uducitam cittam samuducitam cittam ekatte santitthati, nivaranehi visujjhati.
ps1.3:3.3: Nekkhammam ekattam, abyapado ekattam, alokasanna ekattam, avikkhepo ekattam, dhammavavatthanam ekattam, nanam ekattam, pamojjam ekattam, sabbepi kusala dhamma ekatta.

ps1.3:52.2: Tassa me te dhamma avajjanapatibaddha honti akankhapatibaddha manasikarapatibaddha cittuppadapatibaddha.

ps1.3:52.6: Yasmim yasmim va pana vatthusmim sati supatthita hoti, tasmim tasmim vatthusmim cittam svadhitthitam hoti.

ps1.3:52.10: Yena yena va pana sati anuparivattati tena tena cittam abhiniharati.
ps1.3:52.13: Paricitati pariggahatthena paricita, parivaratthena paricita, paripuratthena paricita.
ps1.3:52.14: Satiya parigganhanto jinati papake akusale dhamme.
ps1.3:52.18: tattha jatanam dhammanam anativattanatthena susamaraddha, indriyanam ekarasatthena susamaraddha, tadupagaviriyavahanatthena susamaraddha, tappaccanikanam kilesanam susamuhatatta susamaraddha.

ps1.3:63.2: Digham assasam addhanasankhate assasati, digham passasam addhanasankhate passasati, digham assasapassasam addhanasankhate assasatipi passasatipi.

ps1.3:117.7: Ya cittassa thiti santhiti avatthiti avisaharo avikkhepo avisahatamanasata samatho samadhindriyam samadhibalam sammasamadhi—
ps1.3:117.9: Samadaham cittam assasapassasavasena vinnanam cittam upatthanam sati anupassana nanam.
ps1.3:117.12: Taya satiya tena nanena tam cittam anupassati.
ps1.3:118.6: samadaham cittam assasapassasavasena cittassa ekaggatam avikkhepam pajanato …pe…
ps1.3:119.1: Katham “vimocayam cittam assasissami”ti sikkhati, “vimocayam cittam passasissami”ti sikkhati?
ps1.3:119.2: “Ragato vimocayam cittam assasissami”ti sikkhati, “ragato vimocayam cittam passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:119.3: “Dosato vimocayam cittam assasissami”ti sikkhati, “dosato vimocayam cittam passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:119.11: “anottappato vimocayam cittam assasissami”ti sikkhati, “anottappato vimocayam cittam passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:119.12: Vimocayam cittam assasapassasavasena vinnanam cittam upatthanam sati …pe….
ps1.3:120.6: vimocayam cittam assasapassasavasena cittassa ekaggatam avikkhepam pajanato …pe…
ps1.3:121.1: Attha anupassanananani attha ca upatthananussatiyo cattari suttantikavatthuni citte cittanupassanaya.
ps1.3:122.6: Pancannam khandhanam udayam passanto kati lakkhanani passati, vayam passanto kati lakkhanani passati, udayabbayam passanto kati lakkhanani passati?
ps1.3:122.7: Pancannam khandhanam udayam passanto pancavisati lakkhanani passati, vayam passanto pancavisati lakkhanani passati.
ps1.3:122.8: Pancannam khandhanam udayabbayam passanto imani pannasa lakkhanani passati.
ps1.3:123.1: “Rupe aniccanupassi assasissami”ti sikkhati, “rupe aniccanupassi passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:123.7: jaramarane aniccanupassi assasissami”ti sikkhati, “jaramarane aniccanupassi passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:123.8: Aniccanupassi assasapassasavasena dhamma upatthanam sati anupassana nanam.
ps1.3:123.11: Taya satiya tena nanena te dhamme anupassati.
ps1.3:124.6: aniccanupassi assasapassasavasena cittassa ekaggatam avikkhepam pajanato …pe…
ps1.3:125.2: Rupe adinavam disva rupavirage chandajato hoti saddhadhimutto, cittancassa svadhitthitam.
ps1.3:125.3: “Rupe viraganupassi assasissami”ti sikkhati, “rupe viraganupassi passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:125.9: jaramarane adinavam disva jaramaranavirage chandajato hoti saddhadhimutto, cittancassa svadhitthitam.
ps1.3:125.10: “Jaramarane viraganupassi assasissami”ti sikkhati, “jaramarane viraganupassi passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:125.11: Viraganupassi assasapassasavasena dhamma upatthanam sati anupassana nanam.
ps1.3:125.14: Taya satiya tena nanena te dhamme anupassati.
ps1.3:126.6: viraganupassi assasapassasavasena cittassa ekaggatam avikkhepam pajanato …pe…
ps1.3:127.2: Rupe adinavam disva rupanirodhe chandajato hoti saddhadhimutto, cittancassa svadhitthitam.
ps1.3:127.3: “Rupe nirodhanupassi assasissami”ti sikkhati, “rupe nirodhanupassi passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:127.9: jaramarane adinavam disva jaramarananirodhe chandajato hoti saddhadhimutto, cittancassa svadhitthitam.
ps1.3:127.10: “Jaramarane nirodhanupassi assasissami”ti sikkhati, “jaramarane nirodhanupassi passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:129.2: Aniccatthena avijjaya adinavo hoti, dukkhatthena avijjaya adinavo hoti, anattatthena avijjaya adinavo hoti, santapatthena avijjaya adinavo hoti, viparinamatthena avijjaya adinavo hoti—
ps1.3:130.2: Nidananirodhena avijja nirujjhati, samudayanirodhena avijja nirujjhati, jatinirodhena avijja nirujjhati, pabhavanirodhena avijja nirujjhati, hetunirodhena avijja nirujjhati, paccayanirodhena avijja nirujjhati, nanuppadena avijja nirujjhati, nirodhupatthanena avijja nirujjhati—
ps1.3:130.5: imehi atthahakarehi avijjanirodhe chandajato hoti saddhadhimutto, cittancassa svadhitthitam.
ps1.3:130.6: “Avijjaya nirodhanupassi assasissami”ti sikkhati, “avijjaya nirodhanupassi passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:131.1: Katihakarehi sankharesu adinavo hoti, katihakarehi sankhara nirujjhanti …pe…
ps1.3:131.2: katihakarehi vinnane adinavo hoti, katihakarehi vinnanam nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.3: katihakarehi namarupe adinavo hoti, katihakarehi namarupam nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.4: katihakarehi salayatane adinavo hoti, katihakarehi salayatanam nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.5: katihakarehi phasse adinavo hoti, katihakarehi phasso nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.6: katihakarehi vedanaya adinavo hoti, katihakarehi vedana nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.7: katihakarehi tanhaya adinavo hoti, katihakarehi tanha nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.8: katihakarehi upadane adinavo hoti, katihakarehi upadanam nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.9: katihakarehi bhave adinavo hoti, katihakarehi bhavo nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.10: katihakarehi jatiya adinavo hoti, katihakarehi jati nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.11: katihakarehi jaramarane adinavo hoti, katihakarehi jaramaranam nirujjhati?
ps1.3:131.12: Pancahakarehi jaramarane adinavo hoti, atthahakarehi jaramaranam nirujjhati.
ps1.3:133.10: Imehi pancahakarehi jaramarane adinavam disva imehi atthahakarehi jaramarananirodhe chandajato hoti saddhadhimutto, cittancassa svadhitthitam.
ps1.3:133.11: “Jaramarane nirodhanupassi assasissami”ti sikkhati, “jaramarane nirodhanupassi passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:133.12: Nirodhanupassi assasapassasavasena dhamma upatthanam sati anupassana nanam.
ps1.3:133.15: Taya satiya tena nanena te dhamme anupassati.
ps1.3:134.6: nirodhanupassi assasapassasavasena cittassa ekaggatam avikkhepam pajanato …pe…
ps1.3:135.8: “Rupe patinissagganupassi assasissami”ti sikkhati, “rupe patinissagganupassi passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:135.18: “Jaramarane patinissagganupassi assasissami”ti sikkhati, “jaramarane patinissagganupassi passasissami”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:135.19: Patinissagganupassi assasapassasavasena dhamma upatthanam sati anupassana nanam.
ps1.3:135.22: Taya satiya tena nanena te dhamme anupassati.
ps1.3:136.10: Patinissagganupassi assasapassasanam samvaratthena silavisuddhi, avikkhepatthena cittavisuddhi, dassanatthena ditthivisuddhi.
ps1.3:136.14: ima tisso sikkhayo avajjanto sikkhati jananto sikkhati …pe…
ps1.3:137.1: Patinissagganupassi assasapassasavasena cittassa ekaggatam avikkhepam pajanato vidita vedana uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti …pe…
ps1.3:137.2: patinissagganupassi assasapassasavasena cittassa ekaggatam avikkhepam pajananto indriyani samodhaneti gocaranca pajanati samatthanca pativijjhati;
ps1.3:137.6: dhamme samodhaneti gocaranca pajanati samatthanca pativijjhati.
ps1.3:139.1: Attha anupassane nanani attha ca upatthananussatiyo cattari suttantikavatthuni dhammesu dhammanupassanaya.
ps1.3:140.2: Digham assasavasena cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi, digham passasavasena cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi …pe…
ps1.3:140.3: vimocayam cittam assasavasena cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi, vimocayam cittam passasavasena cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi.
ps1.3:141.2: Digham assasam aniccato anupassanatthena vipassana, dukkhato anupassanatthena vipassana, anattato anupassanatthena vipassana, digham passasam aniccato anupassanatthena vipassana, dukkhato anupassanatthena vipassana, anattato anupassanatthena vipassana …pe…

ps1.3:142.6: nibbidananam, patinissagganupassi passasam yathabhutam janati passatiti—
ps1.3:143.2: Aniccanupassi assasam bhayatupatthane panna nibbidanulome nanam, aniccanupassi passasam bhayatupatthane panna nibbidanulome nanam …pe…
ps1.3:143.3: patinissagganupassi assasam bhayatupatthane panna nibbidanulome nanam, patinissagganupassi passasam bhayatupatthane panna nibbidanulome nanam—
ps1.3:144.2: Aniccanupassi assasam patisankha santitthana panna nibbidapatippassaddhinanam, aniccanupassi passasam patisankha santitthana panna nibbidapatippassaddhinanam …pe…
ps1.3:144.3: patinissagganupassi assasam patisankha santitthana panna nibbidapatippassaddhinanam, patinissagganupassi passasam patisankha santitthana panna nibbidapatippassaddhinanam—
ps1.3:145.2: Sotapattimaggena sakkayaditthiya pahinatta samucchinnatta uppajjati vimuttisukhe nanam, vicikicchaya pahinatta samucchinnatta uppajjati vimuttisukhe nanam, silabbataparamasassa …pe…
ps1.3:145.3: ditthanusayassa, vicikicchanusayassa pahinatta samucchinnatta uppajjati vimuttisukhe nanam, sakadagamimaggena olarikassa, kamaragasannojanassa …pe…
ps1.3:145.4: patighasannojanassa, olarikassa kamaraganusayassa, patighanusayassa pahinatta samucchinnatta uppajjati vimuttisukhe nanam, anagamimaggena anusahagatassa kamaragasannojanassa …pe…
ps1.3:145.5: patighasannojanassa, anusahagatassa kamaraganusayassa, patighanusayassa pahinatta samucchinnatta uppajjati vimuttisukhe nanam, arahattamaggena, ruparagassa …pe…
ps1.3:145.6: aruparagassa, manassa, uddhaccassa, avijjaya, mananusayassa, bhavaraganusayassa, avijjanusayassa pahinatta samucchinnatta uppajjati vimuttisukhe nanam.
ps1.3:145.8: Solasavatthukam anapanassatisamadhim bhavayato samadhikani imani dve nanasatani uppajjanti.
